meanings.definition: To make a photocopy using a xerographic copier.
meanings.sent1: She was xeroxing important documents for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: I need to xerox this report before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The office was buzzing with the sound of xeroxing machines.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved swiftly, xeroxing page after page.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive sound of xeroxing echoed through the hallway.

meanings.definition: The act of making a photocopy using a xerographic copier.
meanings.sent1: Xeroxing is a common task in most offices.
meanings.sent2: I'll handle the xeroxing while you prepare the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The xeroxing machine decided to take a break and refused to work.
meanings.sent4: The efficiency of the xeroxing process saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The pile of xeroxing papers grew taller by the minute.
